description: '''Chalermpol Malakham''' (also written '''Malakam''', {{langx|th|เฉลิมพล มาลาคำ}}; born 10 October 1962 in [[Surin Province]]), is a singer from the [[Isan]] area of [[Thailand]].  Known mostly for the [[Luk Thung]] and [[Mor lam]] styles, he is also considered a talented performer of [[Kantrum]].  Although the majority of Chalermpol's songs are in Thai, he often sings in [[Northern Khmer dialect|Northern Khmer]] as well.
